emuInput.TitMainTitle: Barbara Jackson, Rosa Jones, and Thomas Woods posed with bicycles and roller skates, in Hill City, vertical format
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1951, pg. 2, reads: "'Wish We'd Win These' - Three Hill City citizens, Barbara Jackson, Rosa Jones and Thomas Woods, fondle some of the prizes which will be given to young citizens of the youth municipality in a contest to determine the outstanding Hill City citizens. A junior high school boy and girl will receive the bicycle and forty-eight other young people will receive pairs of skates.  Prizes were secured by the Hill City board of directors.  The contest closes May 22, and awards will be made May 29.  A few entry blanks are still available at Hill City, 2038 Bedford Avenue. - Harris Photo."
